actions.text: Amendment SA 1973 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1973 proposed by Senator Marshall to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3495; text as modified: CR S3495) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need to conduct a comprehensive investigation to determine the origins of COVID-19, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1973 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1973 proposed by Senator Marshall to Amendment SA 1502.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need to conduct a comprehensive investigation to determine the origins of COVID-19, and for other purposes.
